_source.message:
Eric Levy, now 94 years old is an absolute hero & living legend.

Arrested at the age of 92 at a protest for Julian Assange in 2021; he is a lifelong anti-war & Freedom campaigner. He travelled to Iraq in 2003 as part of the Human Shield Movement to protect the Iraqi citizens. He was also in Baghdad during the American ‚ÄòShock and Awe‚Äô bombardment.

Currently in hospital & while he is now speaking & eating independently again; they put him on end of life care which was successfully stopped thanks to friends & family including our own Keith Whitty. Hopeful for discharge this week, friends and family remain with him to ensure the best of care is given.

It brings tears to my eyes to see what they are doing to our elderly, but for now I want to wish Eric the absolute best & I hope to see him fit & healthy very soon standing strong in the face of Tyranny.

Eric sends a message; KEEP PROTESTING! This man should inspire each & every one of us. Eric, we love you, stay strong, our Hero.

@Covid19vaccinevictims

They could be assigned security duties at churches, just as abortion clinics were protected by Eric Holder. But that is not happening, because of anti-white racism and anarcho-tyranny.

https://vdare.com/posts/roe-anarcho-tyranny-and-the-deep-state

Daily letter, call and email. Do not stop. Do not get held up in the noise. We are making tremendous impact. 6/27/2022
Dear Legislature and Senators
My daily letter to you,
The right to vote is a God-given right that has been taken from us. I have seen enough evidence to reach a conclusion.  Forensic audits in all 50 states are necessary to restore voter confidence and voter integrity. We simply do not have confidence or TRUST in our elected (selected) officials. 2000 MULES. ORGANIZED ELECTION FRAUD. ABSENTEE BALLOT Fraud, MACHINE fraud. COVID FRAUD. STOP THE MASS MAILOUT OF BALLOT APPLICATION
Connecticut uses ERIC, plausible deniability by the Secretary of State‚Äôs office in their refusal to provide data issued by a FOIA request of voters removed from the voter rolls since 2020. The ultimate responsibility resides with the Secretary of State‚Äôs office. ‚ÄúERIC is paid by its members to provide two services: 1) to keep their voter registration rolls accurate and up-to-date, and 2) to increase access to voter registration for ALL eligible citizens. ERIC charges a $25,000 one-time joining fee and then members pay annual dues based on a formula that includes the voting age population as a factor‚Äù. Our tax dollars are paying for this system to keep inaccurate voter rolls and allows the election fraud to continue.
https://andmagazine.substack.com/p/who-is-eric-and-is-the-fox-guarding?r=193470&s=r
ERIC connection to George Soros.
https://andmagazine.substack.com/p/whats-the-connection-between-eric
Democratic and RINO policies do not work. This is a powerful commentary by Justice Thomas. Democratic policies have enslaved the African American communities, and the current administration is causing widespread slavery in the form of human trafficking.
https://nypost.com/2022/06/22/how-liberal-policies-have-killed-black-communities-clarence-thomas/
Covid 19
The CDC, NIADH and FDA are totally corrupt agencies. They are pay for play agencies. They never monitored VAERS database for adverse reactions related to Covid 19 vaccinations. This is from a FOIA request.
https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/cdc-vaers-covid-vaccine-safety/
Covid 19 vaccine adverse reports from FDA and Pfizer‚Äôs own documents. Moderna is a United States company that was on the verge of Bankruptcy before Covid 19. They are currently being sued for their post vaccination data.  How many of our state representatives, senators, DPH officials, medical organizations and pay for play non-profit organizations in Connecticut own stock in these criminal companies?
https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/pfizer-covid-vaccine-trials-adverse-events-shots-fda-eua-documents/
Peter 2:19 
While they promise them liberty, they themselves are the servants of corruption: for of whom a man is overcome, of the same is he brought in bondage.
Thank you for your time,

_source.message:
State prosecutors seek Biden's injunction after whistleblower documents reveal biden's true goals

New behind-the-scenes planning documents uncovered by Sen. Chuck Grassley (Iowa) and Josh Hawley (Missouri) contain shocking evidence of the true purpose of the Orwellian Disinformation Management Board of the PRESIDENT of the United States, which became known as the Biden Truth Ministry. These documents are part of a collection of documents handed over to the two senators by the whistleblower.

Whistleblower dossiers show that the Board of Directors was conceived as a means for the Biden regime to push tech companies to censor speech.

Two state attorneys general, Eric Schmitt of Missouri and Jeff Landry of Louisiana, are currently seeking a preliminary injunction to prevent Biden and his administration from colluding with social media giants such as Facebook, Twitter and YouTube.

"Der italienische Stardirigent Riccardo Muti verweigert, in der Auff√ºhrung der Verdi-Oper ‚ÄûEin Maskenball‚Äú das Wort ‚ÄúNeger‚Äù zu streichen, sondern h√§lt sich weiterhin an den Originaltext. Viele feiern das als Zeichen gegen die Zensur der ‚ÄûPolitischen Korrektheit‚Äù andere attackieren den 80-J√§hrigen als Verbreiter ‚Äúrassistischer‚Äù Denkweisen.

Die meisten Opernh√§user strichen ganze Passage¬†

Da viele B√ºrger mittlerweile Angst haben, das Wort ‚ÄúNeger‚Äù √ºberhaupt in den Mund zu nehmen und es somit oftmals als ‚ÄúN-Wort‚Äù umschrieben wird, strichen die meisten Theater und Opern das Wort aus den Texten und schrieben weltber√ºhmte Opern einfach um.

Im konkreten Fall gibt es im ersten Akt der Oper eine Konversation, in der der Richter eine Unterschrift f√ºr die Verbannung der Wahrsagerin Ulrica ben√∂tigt, die seiner Aussage nach ‚Äûvom unreinen Blut der Neger (dell‚Äôimmondo sangue dei negri)‚Äú ist. Mittlerweile haben weltbekannte Opernh√§user wie die Scala in Mailand, die Met in New York oder Covent Garden in London diese Stelle mittlerweile umformuliert oder gar gestrichen, nicht so der Neapolitaner Riccardo Muti gegen√ºber einer der gr√∂√üten italienischen¬†Tageszeitungen:

Giuseppe Verdi war kein Rassist, es geht ihm darum, die rassistische Einstellung, die Brutalit√§t und die Ignoranz des Richters schonungslos aufzuzeigen.

Sogar der schwarze S√§nger sieht darin kein Problem

Besonders absurd: Der im Text genannte Schwarze wird vom Tenor Lunga Eric Hallam, der selbst aus Afrika kommt, gesungen. Laut Muti habe er diesen auch gefragt, ob die Verwendung des Wortes Neger beleidigend sei:

Ich habe ihn gefragt, ob ihn dies st√∂re oder verletze, nach meiner Erkl√§rung sagte er: ,No problem, Maestro.‚Äò "
